text: Alyson Renee "Aly" Michalka (born March 25, 1989) is an American actress and musician. She works with Disney Channel and takes part in duo group 78violet with her sister, Amanda Michalka. She is most well known for playing the part of Keely Teslow on the Disney series Phil of the Future. ==Early life== Alyson Michalka was born in Torrance, California, United States on March 25, 1989 to Mark Michalka and Carrie Begley-Michalka. She was raised mostly in the city of Seattle, Washington. She has two dogs named Saint and Bandit. ==Later life == She began to be home schooled. She started acting for Disney Channel on Phil of the Future, then began her singing career. She says on Disney 411 that she started playing guitar with her sister at the ages of 12 and 10. She lives in a multimillion-dollar California mansion. ==Musical career== Michalka has been singing since her sister was able to speak and sing. Then, for the movie Now You See It... her sister and she started a band and created a music video called Do You Believe In Magic?. The band is called 78violet. Then they left Disney Channel to "take off" with their musical career. ==Acting career == Soon she started acting for Disney Channel in the show Phil of the Future, which she had quit in 2006. She has been seen in many movies, outside of Disney channel, she worked with WB and NBC with TV dramas with her sister. She was most known for playing Keely Teslow in Phil of the Future on Disney Channel, though now has gained popularity being in a band. She has been in other Disney Channel productions like Now You See It... and Cow Belles. She is half of the musical duo 78violet, with her sister. ===Filmography === * Phil of the Future (2004-2006)-- Keely Teslow * Now You See It... (2005 movie)-- Allyson Miller * Cow Belles (2006 movie)-- Taylor Callum * Bandslam (2009 movie) -- Charlotte Barnes * Hellcats (2010 movie)-- ===Discography === * Do You Believe In Magic?–2005 * No One–Ice Princess, 2005 * Walking on Sunshine–Herby: Fully Loaded, 2005 * Into the Rush–Twitches, 2005 * Chemicals React–2006 * Pontential Break Up Song–2007 ==Other websites == * * Hollywood Records's Aly & AJ Bio Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Musicians from Los Angeles County, California Category:American rock guitarists Category:American pop musicians Category:Actors from Torrance, California
title: Alyson Michalka
